products.title: Pipkin Plum
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

products.title: Sherbourne Plum Roman Blind - Standard Lining
products.description: A abstract design using complimentary colours with matt and sheen threads. Avaialble in various colour options. Sherbourne plum roman blind - standard lining available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Alnwick Plum Roman Blind - Standard Lining
products.description: Using matt and sheen threads to create a wood grain effect across the fabric. Available in other colours. Alnwick plum roman blind - standard lining available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
